arts.ttl: Derry City pile misery on St Patrick's Athletic
arts.sum: To open proceedings in Richmond Park, Jason McClelland wandered through the Derry City midfield to produce the first chance of the game, saved by Brian Maher on his 120th consecutive appearance for Derry. Winning a couple of corners just after the 20-minute mark, their big chance came as Michael Duffy received the ball through the lines and played Ronan Boyce out wide.
